title: Low fps Patch 7.24
body:
Please help, just patched the game and played a game of poroking and i noticed that i had some trouble with my fps. 
But when i joined a ranked game the whole champ select was laggy as hell. And when i got into the game i had 1-2 fps were i otherwise have a solid 60 fps.
Have no idea if its the new patch or my computer that is going bananas.

replies.body: Hmmmm something must not be working 100% correctly for the entire client to start lagging like that. I'd first switch on low-spec mode to see if that helps, but also check your graphics drivers for updates and run through the [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) for basic troubleshooting too.
